document.full_text: the man in charge of canada's largest chain of newspapers, paul godfrey, is reshaping his titles for the digital age in a cost-cutting drive that will bring extensive retraining and more job cuts.
document.title: canada's postmedia trims for digital age
lines_and_colors: the man in charge of canada's largest chain of newspapers, paul godfrey, is reshaping his titles for the digital age in a cost-cutting drive that will bring extensive retraining and more job cuts.
